video_prompt: Robot's subtle upward gaze shifts, expression softening. Hand with rings gently spreads across its face, camera held in the other. Two blurred human figures recede into the distance on the ascending staircase. Dust motes drift and shimmer, while a soft lens flare subtly undulates.
image_prompt: A humanoid robot with green and blue hair and green eyes, smiling slightly, posing on an outdoor staircase. The robot has polished pink and gold metallic skin (except hands and face), wears a white shirt, dark blazer, black boots, and a black shoulder bag. It holds a black camera in its left hand, its right hand touches its face, revealing gold rings. Gold barrettes, a gold choker, and a black digital watch are visible. Blurred human figures and a streetlamp are in the background; the sky is overcast. Soft lighting creates a dreamlike ambiance with scattered bright specks and a subtle rainbow lens flare in the bottom right corner. Portrait orientation.
refined_video_prompt: A robot's gaze subtly shifts upward, its expression progressively softening. A ringed hand gently spreads across its face. In the background, two blurred human figures actively recede up an ascending staircase. Dust motes continuously drift and shimmer, while a soft lens flare subtly undulates.
